query:
-- Verify veterinary data
SELECT 'Veterinarians' as table_name, COUNT(*) as record_count FROM veterinarians
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Extension Agents', COUNT(*) FROM extension_agents
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Prescriptions', COUNT(*) FROM prescriptions
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Appointments', COUNT(*) FROM appointments
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Telemedicine Sessions', COUNT(*) FROM telemedicine_sessions
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Calendar Syncs', COUNT(*) FROM calendar_syncs
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Notification Preferences', COUNT(*) FROM notification_preferences
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Notification Logs', COUNT(*) FROM notification_logs
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Expenses', COUNT(*) FROM expenses WHERE farmId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Revenue', COUNT(*) FROM revenue WHERE farmId = 1;
